org.kiji.schema
Class KeyValueBackedWrapper<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.kiji.schema.KijiDataWrapper<T>
      org.kiji.schema.KeyValueBackedWrapper<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The output data type of wrapped data.
Direct Known Subclasses:
PutWrapper
public abstract class KeyValueBackedWrapper<T>
extends KijiDataWrapper<T>

Base class of wrappers that use KeyValues as the internal representation of wrapped data.

See Also:
KijiDataWrapper

Wraps value in type specified by T and adds it to buffer.

Specified by:
add in class KijiDataWrapper<T>
Parameters:
id - The entity id of the row to write to.
family - The family to write the data to.
qualifier - The qualifier of the column to write the data to.
schema - The writer schema for the value.
timestamp - The timestamp at which the data will be written.
value - The data payload.
Throws:
IOException - If there is a problem writing.

                           throws IOException
Used to wrap a data element in a KeyValue.

Parameters:
entityId - The entity id of the row to write to.
family - The family to write the data to.
qualifier - The qualifier of the column to write the data to.
schema - The writer schema for the value.
timestamp - The timestamp at which the data will be written.
value - The data payload.
Returns:

Throws:
